subject: Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The Discovery Channel pro cycling team is “considering all legal options” against former team captain Frankie Andreu, in the wake of Andreu’s confession that he used EPO in preparation for the 1999 Tour de France.
snippet: The Discovery Channel pro cycling team is “considering all legal options” against former team captain Frankie Andreu, in the wake of Andreu’s confession that he used EPO in preparation for the 1999 Tour de France.
